name: Roller (itch) (TheYargonaut)
description:
Enter the role of a Manager at Toy and Cleaning Agent manufacturer X-Corp! Subsidiary of ALPHA Unlimited!

Manage and train your AI underling, who will absolutely never try to take yer jerb!

After a Story Mode of intrigue, shoot for 'Employee of the Year' with Arcade Mode!

Satisfaction Guaranteed!*

Made by Mason Rumuly in the 2017 Chillenium Game Jam.

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0

*No monetary obligations assumed under this guarantee. Terms and Conditions apply. Not applicable in Sealand. See ALPHA Unlimited Legal Representative for details.
